definition: to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

sentences.english: Road safety checkers, at intersections and other potential dangerous locations.
sentences.chinese: 道路安全員，把守路口和其他具有現在危險的地方。

sentences.english: The soldiers guarded the only access to the building.
sentences.chinese: 士兵把守着通向那棟樓的唯一通道。

sentences.english: The major set a brigade to guard the pass.
sentences.chinese: 少校派了一個旅把守關隘。

sentences.english: Set a guard over my mouth, O Lord ; keep watch over the door of my lips.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，求你禁止我的口，把守我的嘴。

sentences.english: If so, will you be able to hold your ground?
sentences.chinese: 如果真是如此，你又有能力把守自己的地盤嗎？

sentences.english: Commander Greb orders his Lieutenants to shut and bar the doors.
sentences.chinese: 葛瑞布命令中尉關閉並把守住門口。

sentences.english: And they departing, made the sepulchre sure, sealing the stone, and setting guards.
sentences.chinese: 他們就去，在石上加了封條，派駐衛兵把守墳墓。

sentences.english: They are now confined to heavily guarded monasteries.
sentences.chinese: 現在他們被關在重兵把守的修道院裏。

sentences.english: During a bull fight, the bull will sometimes stake out a particular part of the ring where it feels safe: its querencia.
sentences.chinese: 在鬥牛的時候，牛有時候會把守一個安全的區域。

sentences.english: French soldiers manned roadblocks in the capital city.
sentences.chinese: 法國士兵把守着首都的各路關卡。

sentences.english: Some inspector are guarding the door.
sentences.chinese: 一些偵探正在把守着門。

sentences.english: Road-blocks and soldiers around power stations cannot prevent digital terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 攔截道路，派兵把守電站都不能防止數字化恐怖主義。

sentences.english: In those days the place was heavily guarded.
sentences.chinese: 那時這地方有重兵把守。

sentences.english: The entrance to the palace were well guarded.
sentences.chinese: 進宮殿的入口處門衛把守得很嚴。

sentences.english: Artificially gating progress creates delays and wait.
sentences.chinese: 人工地把守進展導致了延遲和等待。

definition: (of troops stationed in a strategic area) to defend/(fig.) to stand guard/to protect
to keep goal/on duty as gatekeeper
secure as a city protected by a wall of metal and a moat of boiling water (idiom)/well fortified/invulnerable to attack
to provide support/to come to the rescue
to hold a pass/to guard (a strategic location)
to make a breakthrough/to break through/to breach (military)
to ambush/to lie in wait for/to lie low/ambush
